entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 09:56 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending early this afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
